properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 12:59PM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...New Advisory.

* WHAT...A period of light snow expected coinciding with the
Thursday morning commute in Western Nevada. Snow accumulations
ranging from just a dusting to around 1 inch with temperatures
near to just below freezing. Can't rule out localized 2 inch
spots.

* WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area and Western
Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM PST Thursday. Most of the snow should
fall between 5 and 8 AM Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions especially on
untreated secondary and neighborhood roads. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute resulting in big
delays and traffic incidents. It doesn't take much snow to cause
major travel problems in Western Nevada. Allow extra time for
travel.
properties.instruction:
Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during
periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to
reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since
it takes longer to stop on slick roadways.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY
